meaning_str.bing:
n. 危险；危害；风险；威胁
网络. 危险物；危险性

危险；风险；威胁；危机；不安全因素；潜在威胁；危险物；危险人物；危险信号；警告标志；前方有险标示

1.en: The Ministry of Defence said the vessel was not carrying nuclear weapons, and there was no danger to the public.
1.cn: 国防大臣表示，这艘潜艇没有搭载核武器，不会对公众造成危险。

2.en: The rate of premiums is determined on the basis of the level of industrial injury risks and that of occupational danger in different trades.
2.cn: 根据不同行业的工伤事故风险和职业危害程度确定不同的行业费率；

3.en: There is no doubt that global warming is a clear and present danger, and geoengineering may be part of the solution to that problem.
3.cn: 毫无疑问，全球变暖是一个明确而现实的危险，地质工程方法也很有可能是解决问题的一把钥匙。

0.en: Aren't we all in grave danger all the time?
0.cn: 我们不是随时都有极大的危险吗？

1.en: How's our ship? Out of danger. You saved the crew.
1.cn: 飞船怎么样了? 脱离危险了，你救了所有人。

3.en: Danger? I walk on the wild side. I laugh in the face of danger.
3.cn: 危险？哈哈，我在荒野中行走，我会当面嘲笑危险。

4.en: You are welcome. Have a lovely holiday. We‘re going on holiday in a camper van. Danger, danger, oil is low.
4.cn: 不用客气，祝你们玩的开心！我们开着露营车去度假。危险危险，机油不足。

5.en: Where's the danger? Who blew their shell? I love you, too!
5.cn: 危险在哪里? 谁吹了海螺? 我也爱你!

6.en: Mom, you can't be here. I know, but you're in danger.
6.cn: 妈妈，你不能来这里的。我知道，但是你有危险了。

7.en: They're in danger. You have to warn them about horunvendush day.
7.cn: 他们有危险，你要让他们当心女王决战日。

8.en: So but everything is normal. Absolutely. And there's no danger to her and the baby?
8.cn: 一切都很正常？对。没有危险？

9.en: Danger will only increase my love. It will sharpen it. It will give it spice.
9.cn: 危险只会增添这份爱。让它更清晰，更丰富。

10.en: I came to tell you that your life is in danger and I need your help.
10.cn: 我来是为了通知你，你有生命危险，而我需要你的帮助。

11.en: You see, in this moment, the real danger to the hosts is not me, but you.
11.cn: 在此刻接待员们所面临真正的危险，不是我，是你。

12.en: You deliberately disobeyed me, and what's worse, you put Nala in danger.
12.cn: 你故意违抗我的命令而，且更糟的是你把娜娜拖入危险。

13.en: Believe me when I tell you, if you win this game, you will be walking into grave danger.
13.cn: 相信我，如果你赢了游戏，你将会有极大的危险。

14.en: He never put us in any real danger. The journal is gone. She can't do anything.
14.cn: 他从未真的让我们有危险。日记已经销毁，她做不了什么。

15.en: Cade, I am in your debt. My name is Optimus Prime. My Autobots. They're in danger.
15.cn: 凯德，我欠你一个恩情，我是擎天柱，我的博派伙伴有危险。

16.en: Beware of being too good at it. That's the danger of living alone it can be very hard to give up.
16.cn: 可别太习惯了，这就是独居的危险，会不愿改变。

17.en: Anna, your life is in danger. There is ice in your heart, put there by your sister.
17.cn: 安娜，你现在很危险，你的心中有一块冰，被你姐姐放进去的。

18.en: Oh. You might want to put a sign on it. Sign right there. Ah. "Danger," sure, sure.
18.cn: 或许你该在箱子上标记一下。标记在这里。"危险"，没错，没错。

19.en: We don't? We really should. From now on, Bert will be our code word for danger.
19.cn: 是吗？应该约一个，从今往后，"bert"就用来作为遇到危险的暗号。
